sections.heading: This Act shall be known as the Agricultural Foreign Investment Disclosure Act.
sections.text: This Act shall be known as the Agricultural Foreign Investment Disclosure Act.

sections.heading: (a)  If the Director determines that a person:
sections.text: (a) If the Director determines that a person:

sections.heading: The Director may take such actions as the Director considers
sections.text:
necessary to monitor compliance with the provisions of this Act and to determine
whether the information contained in any report submitted under Section
3 accurately and fully reveals the ownership interest of all foreign persons
in any foreign person who is required to submit a report under such Section.

sections.heading: A foreign person required to make a report to the Director
sections.text:
by Section 3 of this Act shall be in full compliance with this Act if such
person files with the Director a copy of the report filed with the Secretary
of the United States Department of Agriculture as required by the Agricultural
Foreign Investment Disclosure Act of 1978, as enacted by Public Law 95-460.

sections.heading: Not later than 90 days after the date of the enactment of this
sections.text:
Act, the Director shall prescribe regulations for purposes of carrying out
the provisions of this Act.

sections.heading: (a)  Except as provided in subsection (b) of this Section,
sections.text: this Act is effective upon its becoming a law.
